name: Overlooking View
description: Reach the very top of Qingyun Peak.

name: The Remains of the Gale
description: Reach the top of the tower in Stormterror's Lair.

name: "Seeds of Stories, Brought By the Wind..."
description: Reach the nameless island northeast of Mondstadt.

name: Unswerving
description: Open the chest in the middle of the heart-shaped rock formation.

name: Initiating Warp Drive!
description: Pass through the time tunnel in the skies of Cape Oath.

name: Beloved of the Anemo Archon
description: Take a seat in the hands of the God Statue in Mondstadt.

name: The Best Sword in the Cemetery
description: Unlock the Tri-Seal of the Sword Cemetery.

name: Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula
description: Follow in the footsteps of immortals, and unlock the Domain's door.

name: Cecilia Garden
description: Return the Seelie to their rightful places and unlock the entrance to a Domain in Wolvendom.

name: Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula
description: Follow the Seelie and light the torches to unlock the entrance to a domain in Wuwang Hill.

name: "If you put your heart into it..."
description: Cook 1 suspicious-tasting dish.

name: "...Anyone can be a gourmet."
description: Cook 10 suspicious-tasting dishes.

name: Boared to Death
description: Be defeated by a wild boar.

name: Golden Gliding License
description: Glide a long, long distance in one go.

name: It's the Same As Having Wings
description: Glide continuously for over 80s.

name: Quick As Lightning
description: Sprint continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.

name: Friends the World Over
description: Meet all sorts of people during your adventure.

name: Megastar in Mondstadt
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Mondstadt.

name: Legend in Liyue
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Liyue.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete 10 Bounties.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete 20 Bounties.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete 30 Bounties.

name: Hero-in-Training
description: Complete 10 Requests.

name: Hero-in-Training
description: Complete 20 Requests.

name: Hero-in-Training
description: Complete 30 Requests.

name: QUEST FAILED
description: Lost track of a Bounty target.

name: The Bleak Midwinter
description: Succumb to Sheer Cold...

name: Priest, Princess, and Scribe
description: Claim the treasure of the Entombed City.

name: Prodigal Son's Return
description: Follow the path of one of the members of the long-lost investigation team to where they embarked on their journey home.

name: Snow-Stored History
description: Discover the fate of a long-lost investigation team that once explored Dragonspine.

name: Glacial Steel
description: Obtain an ancient weapon made of Starsilver.

name: Futile Endeavor
description: Discover the remains of many ruin machines.

name: Untellable Tale
description: Make an unexpected friend in an unexpected location.

name: Towering Achievement
description: Reach the summit of Dragonspine.

name: Winter Wonderland
description: Discover a Cryo Crystalfly beneath a snow pile.

name: The Hunter Becomes the Hunted
description: Be defeated by The Great Snowboar King.

name: Chill Out!
description: Defeat The Great Snowboar King while the latter is in berserker mode.

name: Glutton for Goulash
description: Learn to make Goulash.

name: Wrath of the Gods
description: Get struck by lightning.

name: Sky High
description: Climb the Skyfrost Nail after it has been restored.

name: Juggernaut
description: Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.

name: The PRISM Program
description: Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

name: "That's one big Crystalfly"
description: Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.

name: "...Not indicative of final product"
description: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.

name: The Bigger They Are...
description: Paralyze a Ruin Guard by attacking its weak point.

name: Through Pass
description: Knock a Pyro Slime out of the hands of a Hilichurl Grenadier.

name: Dolorous Stroke
description: Defeat an opponent by Shattering the ice they are trapped in.

name: Hilichurl Champion
description: Defeat a Stonehide Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

name: Bon Appétit
description: Have 4 party members in the Full state at the same time.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over 5,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over 20,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over 50,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Fantastic Four
description: Complete a Domain using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.

name: "Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"
description: Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

name: "That Was Blooming Hot"
description: Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

name: Outlander Vs. Outlander
description: Defeat Childe without any party member being marked and then hit by his follow-up attack.

name: The End of the Beginning
description: Complete the Mondstadt Archon Quests.

name: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
description: Complete "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

name: For a Tomorrow Without Tears
description: Complete "For a Tomorrow Without Tears."

name: Song of the Dragon and Freedom
description: Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom."

name: Let the Wind Lead
description: Obtain the power of Anemo.

name: ...Or a New Storm?
description: Banish the dragon attacking Mondstadt.

name: Knighthood Excellence

description: Fail to borrow the Holy Relic... but learn of the Knights' dilemma.

name: Winds Change Their Course
description: Be rescued by Dvalin.

name: Of the Land Amidst Monoliths
description: Complete "Of the Land Amidst Monoliths"

name: Farewell, Archaic Lord
description: Complete "Farewell, Archaic Lord."

name: Outlandish Behavior

name: Silly-Billy Churlish Ghoul
description: Agree to play with Dusky Ming.

name: That Smells Divine
description: Figure out which perfume Rex Lapis is fond of.

name: It's Bigger on the Inside
description: Clean Madame Ping's teapot.

name: Ticked, Tacked, and Towed
description: Commission others to finish your work, unfettered by such things as Mora.

name: Respecting Cultural Heritage
description: You failed to find the Cocogoat... but manage to repair a mechanism.

description: Prepare everything necessary for the Rite of Parting.

name: I'll Let You Off... This Time
description: Defeat Childe.

name: Derailed
description: Defeat the Overlord of the Vortex.

name: Final Farewell
description: Take part in the Rite of Parting.

description: Complete "A New Star Approaches".

description: Finish "Whispers in the Wind" 5 times.

description: Help Huai'an repair Wangshu Inn's broken bridge.

name: Beginner's Luck
description: Select the highest-value jade on your first try.

description: Collect the entire "Moonlit Bamboo Forest" series.

name: Color It In
description: Create 600 dyes.

name: Precision Modeling
description: Learn 60 furnishing blueprints.

name: Precision Modeling
description: Learn 120 furnishing blueprints.

name: Precision Modeling
description: Learn 180 furnishing blueprints.

name: My... Territory
description: Place 50 furnishings in a single realm layout.

name: My... Territory
description: Place 150 furnishings in a single realm layout.

name: My... Territory
description: Place 300 furnishings in a single realm layout.

name: Yo-Ho-Ho, and a Bottle of Dandelion Wine
description: Climb aboard your Waverider.

name: Mighty and Illuminated Wave Rider
description: Continuously sail your Waverider for a certain period of time.

name: Nice Boat!
description: Switch Waveriders with another player.

name: ...And Her Name Is the Mary Celeste
description: Suffer the destruction of your Waverider...

name: Déjà Vu!
description: Continuously sail your Waverider at high speeds for a certain period of time.

name: The Gathering Storm
description: Earn the chance to go to Inazuma on board the Alcor.

name: Ready, Fight!
description: Earn your first victory in The Crux Clash.

name: Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves
description: Complete "Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves."

name: Honored Guest of the Realm
description: Invite a companion to move in to your Serenitea Pot.

name: Fireside Chats
description: Unlock 10 interactions with your companions.

name: Fireside Chats
description: Unlock 20 interactions with your companions.

name: Fireside Chats
description: Unlock 30 interactions with your companions.

name: Gifts All Around
description: Receive 5 gifts from your companions.

name: Gifts All Around
description: Receive 10 gifts from your companions.

name: Gifts All Around
description: Receive 20 gifts from your companions.

name: Tales of Monstrous Madness
description: Collect the entire "Toki Alley Tales" series.

name: Illustrious in Inazuma
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Inazuma.

name: Yamada Go's Wooden Mallet
description: See through the illusions of the Tanuki several times.

name: "Kujirai Art, Temari Jutsu"
description: Play a game of Temari with Kujirai.

name: Temari for Life
description: Have another player join a game of Temari that you are hosting.

name: Paimon's Lucky Day!
description: Draw a "Great Fortune" fortune slip at the Grand Narukami Shrine.

name: Just My Luck...
description: Draw a "Great Curse" slip at the Grand Narukami Shrine

name: Underground... Overrated?
description: Sometimes, the real treasure is the things you learn along the way.

name: SHUUMATSU GAIDEN
description: Get caught up in the fight between the Shuumatsuban and the Fatui...

name: Iwakura Out
description: Witness the end of the Iwakura Clan.

name: Who Let the Dogs Out
description: Set Toratarou free.

name: You Can't Help Your Feelings
description: Help Hiromi resolve his angst.

name: "The Seventh Samurai"
description: Help Xavier finish his film.

name: They Shall Not Grow Old
description: Pay your respects to the deceased.

name: Oh, the Humanity!
description: Witness the fate of the Samurai.

name: A Hollow Soul
description: Find Washizu's lost possessions.

name: ...And I Would Walk 3,000 More
description: Find Chouji on Tatarasuna and Narukami Island.

name: A Doctor's Odyssey
description: Find out what happened to Yasumoto.

name: Knock Knock
description: Disable the containment dome surrounding the Mikage Furnace.

name: Kannazuka Battle Plan
description: Defeat the revived Electro Hypostasis.

name: Why We Fight
description: Help Masanori return to his senses.

name: Oowazamono
description: Defeat Masanori with ease.

name: Second Blooming
description: Obtain Hanayama Kaoru's gift.

name: Thank You, Come Again
description: Obtain the grand prize from Takashi's chests.

name: Shocking... Positively Shocking
description: Get struck down by Balethunder...

name: Jackpot
description: Use the Kamuijima Cannon to reveal a treasure trove.

name: Blade of Tatara
description: Obtain the diagram of a certain weapon from the past.

name: For the Future of Narukami...
description: Return the wards needed for the Cleansing Ritual.

name: Rest in Peace
description: End the wrath of 10 deceased samurai.

name: If I Run Fast Enough...
description: Defeat a Maguu Kenki without being hit by its phantom's attacks.

name: In This Solemn Matter Let No One Interfere!
description: Defeat a Maguu Kenki without triggering its "Oushi no Omote" parry.

name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
description: Defeat a Primo Geovishap without reflecting its Primordial Shower.

name: Burned Yourself, Did You?
description: Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis that has reignited twice.

name: Smells like Animal Spirit!
description: Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis after being hit by its mimetic 3-hit combo.

name: Core Breakthrough
description: Defeat a Perpetual Mechanical Array after paralyzing all 4 types of its Ruin Sentinels.

name: Could All Uninvolved Machinery Please Leave Immediately?
description: Defeat the Perpetual Mechanical Array without defeating any of its Ruin Sentinels.

name: Fight Fire With Fire
description: Defeat a Kairagi: Fiery Might while their weapon is infused with Pyro.

name: Ride the Lightning
description: Defeat a Kairagi: Dancing Thunder while their weapon is infused with Electro.

name: I Hear Thunder...
description: Be struck by the lightning called down by a Crackling Axe Mitachurl...

name: Through the Storm
description: Reach the Outsider Settlement

name: Hiiragi Sanjuuro
description: Escort the goods successfully and leave Ritou

name: The Aspirations of All
description: Come into contact with the Statue of the Omnipresent God, the symbol of Eternity.

name: The Princess Behind the Curtain
description: Officially make the acquaintance of the young lady of the Kamisato Clan.

name: Omamori, Justice, Number One
description: Complete the "three small wishes."

name: Jailhouse Fiesta
description: Rescue Masakatsu successfully.

name: To Brave the Lightning's Glow
description: Become the target of the Vision Hunt Decree.
